metadata.title: CVE-2019-19069 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A memory leak in the fastrpc_dma_buf_attach() function indrivers/misc/fastrpc.c in the Linux kernel before 5.3.9 allows attackers tocause a denial of service (memory consumption) by triggeringdma_get_sgtable() failures, aka CID-fc739a058d99.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
